title: Who are some singers like Chester Bennington? - Quora

response.answer_text: See …if you want to get some more Chester Bennington songs, you can listen to Dead By Sunrise And because no one can replace Chester Some awesome metal singers. that you might like: Corey Taylor Serj Tankian James Hetfield Matt Kiichi Heafy Matt Shadows these are just a few….BUT I HAVE A LOOOOOOOOOONG LIST OF AWESOME SINGERS! But yeah… Spencer Sotelo of Periphery is a singer who sound a LOT like Chester Bennington RIP CHESTER….. -JOSHI_17
